name: HistRstMMT
title: Historical restrictiveness of patient MMT experience
description: Historical restrictiveness of patient MMT experience is a measure of latent class membership based on work by Conway et al 2023. Class 1: California, Colorado, Florida, Indiana, Kansas, Kentucky, Missouri, New York, North Carolina, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Tennessee, West Virginia. Class 2: Alabama, Alaska, Arkansas, Connecticut, Georgia, Louisiana, Maine, Mississippi, Nebraska, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New Mexico, South Carolina, Virginia. Class 3: Arizona, Delaware, District of Columbia, Hawaii, Idaho, Illinois, Iowa, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Montana, Nevada, North Dakota, Oklahoma, Oregon, Rhode Island, South Dakota, Texas, Utah, Vermont, Washington, Wisconsin.
